issue.title: [CI][Python] Use venv, not virtualenv, in CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15890](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15890). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The standard `venv` module is enough to create virtual environments without installing the `virtualenv` module. It will also solve virtualenv installation issues on some setups such as macOS wheel builders.
